Instructions:
 1. Go to Home Screen.
 2. Long Press on an empty part of the screen. (Edit Home options should pop up)
 3. Click on Widgets.
 4. Find TODO WIDGET
 5. Drag and drop on a screen with adequate space.
 6. Resize as needed.

 FAQ:
 Nothing shows up on my TODO widget?
 Refresh the widget by long pressing and then resize it and it should work. Also make sure app has storage permission, your TODOs are stored on your internal drive on a file call todolist.json, try not to alter this file if you don't know how to edit json files.
